message.content:
cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.LG

The paper deals with the fusion of audio and visual signals to determine speakers in a video. This involves techniques from multimedia (cs.MM), computer vision (cs.CV), and signal processing (cs.SD). The paper also mentions the use of natural language processing (cs.CL) to some extent. Finally, the approach used in the paper involves statistical aggregation, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG).
